config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'guiAdvancedOptions' is loaded from preferences and used to set various GUI elements in the application based on the values stored in the configuration.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration 'guiAdvancedOptions' is triggered whenever the loadPrefs() method is called, which typically happens when the application starts or when the user accesses the settings related to the GUI advanced options.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'guiAdvancedOptions' configuration option is mainly on the user interface of the application. Depending on the value of the configuration, different advanced options may be displayed or hidden in the GUI, providing users with more or less control over certain features of the application.
